item.description:
This Tuesday, volunteer at the Red Sox Game to help with the Poland Spring Green Team recycling program! This is a fun event in the great atmosphere of Fenway Park, and the actual volunteering is quite easy. This is a great way to get into the park and enjoy the game for free! Boston Rotaract has volunteered at several games before, and we've all had a blast.

If you can make it, please RSVP here on Meetup as well as get in contact with Justine Grosso (Boston Rotaract VP, grosso.justine@gmail.com), who will need to submit names in advance to the ballpark.

Wear comfortable close-toed shoes (sneakers are fine) that you can walk in. No flip flops.

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Volunteer at Fenway Park - see the Red Sox play and get a free hotdog!
